It seems a lot of people are having trouble or dont know how to install these. 

1)First download ES File explorer from the Android market place.

2) Go into Settings > Applications and check Unknown Sources.

3) Open up ES File Explorer and navigate to the folder where you loaded the games and install.

This is method allows you to install any apk that is not from the market. Most games work great on my Motorola Triumph.

Not that I'm not grateful for your uploads BONE I just don't get why they ask for those kind of permissions seems fishy no?

People, you can alter the permissions of the apk file if you use Root Explorer or something similar. You have to move the apk to your systems\app folder and enable Read/Write options. Long press on the apk and choose "permissions". I do it all the time on my tablet.
